title: Veterinary Medicinal Products, Medicated Feed and Fertilisers Regulation Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Veterinary Medicinal Products,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Veterinary Medicinal Products, 
Medicated Feed and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023 (Part 3) (Commencement) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited veterinary medicinal product medicated feed fertiliser regulation act 2023 (part 3) (commencement) order 2023

title: Veterinary Medicinal Products, Medicated Feed and Fertilisers Regulation Act
heading: 2. The day appointed as the day on which Part 3 of the Veterinary
text_raw:
2. The day appointed as the day on which Part 3 of the Veterinary 
Medicinal Products, Medicated Feed and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023 (No. 
21 of 2023) comes into operation is 24 July 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 July, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [377] 3
text_norm: 2 day appointed day part 3 veterinary medicinal product medicated feed fertiliser regulation act 2023 (no 21 2023) come operation 24 july 2023 given official seal 20 july 2023 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th july 2023 377 3

title: Veterinary Medicinal Products, Medicated Feed and Fertilisers Regulation Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations commence Part 3 of the Veterinary Medicinal Products, 
Medicated Feed and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023, which amends the 
Fertilisers, Feeding Stuffs and Mineral Mixtures Act 1955. These Regulations 
provide for a National Fertiliser Database, which will include the registers of 
Fertiliser Economic Operators and Professional Fertiliser End Users and all 
fertiliser imports and sales data. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [377]
